query: SELECT a.id, a.artistName, COUNT(rt.id) as riderCount FROM artists a LEFT JOIN riderTemplates rt ON a.id = rt.artistId WHERE a.artistName LIKE '%Luna%' GROUP BY a.id, a.artistName;
